ai-patthana8.43:0.2_0: under the investigation of principles, illustrious and confusion,
ai-patthana8.43:0.3_0: gets the production of the mind-made body and mind-controlled
ai-patthana8.43:1.1_0: or mind is not the cause of the reason for the sake of the mind.
ai-patthana8.43:1.1_1: This is the section in brief.
